players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "I am the Mafioso and I killed Alice last night. Keep an eye on Bob, as he seems suspicious."
Diana: "Bob is suspicious, but I don't think he's the Mafioso. Charlie has already confessed to being the Mafioso and killing Alice last night."
